title: dalacinavAru
sahitya:
dalacinavAru dhanyulayyEru


caraNam 1    dalaci vEDukoni golicina vAriki phalamula nosagE lalitamba ninu
    caraNam 2    kOri sannidhi jEri nIpada vArijamula manasAraga golici
    caraNam 3    konsapu narula noppimpaga ninu madiyinci cAla bhajiyinci niratamu
    caraNam 4    sura ripula damana kumAra janani karuNA rakSAkSi kaumAriyani sadA
